dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Ugh, I just, I cannot even believe this!
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Ugh, I just, I cannot even believe this!

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Oh my god, I know, right?! Seven people!
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oh my god, I know, right?! Seven people!
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: A criminal case has been opened into the death of a family of seven people in the Mangystau region.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Seven! And five of them, like, minors! Just, uh, died on the spot.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Seven! And five of them, like, minors! Just, uh, died on the spot.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Rescuers and ambulance crews who arrived to provide assistance found the bodies of seven people at the scene, including five minors. All of them died on the spot.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Yes, exactly! From poisoning! Like, carbon monoxide, they think.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yes, exactly! From poisoning! Like, carbon monoxide, they think.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: A criminal case has been opened regarding the poisoning of a family with carbon monoxide in the Munaily district.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: The chimney, right? An icy chimney. That's, that's what they're saying.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: The chimney, right? An icy chimney. That's, that's what they're saying.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: According to the relatives and neighbors of the deceased family, the cause of the tragedy could have been an icy chimney in the house, due to which carbon monoxide stopped escaping and began to accumulate in the home.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: And then, get this, the rescuers! They check these things, usually.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: And then, get this, the rescuers! They check these things, usually.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Rescuers claim that they regularly check the stoves in the village and conduct explanatory talks with residents.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Oh, I know! But this house, like, somehow they just, um, missed it.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oh, I know! But this house, like, somehow they just, um, missed it.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: However, for some reason, the house where the tragedy occurred was not included in the list of those being checked.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Missed it! They went around, like, thousands of residents, but not this house.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Missed it! They went around, like, thousands of residents, but not this house.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: We conducted agitation in this area, went around more than 500 yards, over 3 thousand residents. But we did not conduct agitation in this house,

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Right?! Unbelievable. So now it's, uh, a criminal case, obviously.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Right?! Unbelievable. So now it's, uh, a criminal case, obviously.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: A criminal case has been opened into the death of a family of seven people in the Mangystau region.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Yes, exactly! And a whole commission, too.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yes, exactly! And a whole commission, too.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: A commission has been created in Munaily district to investigate the causes of the family's gas poisoning.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: To investigate everything, yeah. And, uh, they're gonna help the family with the burial and stuff.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: To investigate everything, yeah. And, uh, they're gonna help the family with the burial and stuff.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The relatives of the deceased family will be provided with comprehensive assistance, including burial,

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Which is good, I guess, but still.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Which is good, I guess, but still.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, but still. And remember, uh, the same region, um, didn't they have that, like, food poisoning thing? With the kids?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, but still. And remember, uh, the same region, um, didn't they have that, like, food poisoning thing? With the kids?
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Earlier, there was a mass food poisoning of students in grades 1-4 in the Mangystai region.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: YES! Oh my god, the students! Like, hundreds of them, right?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Y E S! Oh my god, the students! Like, hundreds of them, right?
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: 466 students were affected, and 98 of them were hospitalized, including two in intensive care.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Hundreds! All in the same, like, Mangystau region.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Hundreds! All in the same, like, Mangystau region.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Earlier, there was a mass food poisoning of students in grades 1-4 in the Mangystai region.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: It's just, like, what is going on there?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: It's just, like, what is going on there?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: I know! It's just, it's wild!
dialogue_turns.tts_text: I know! It's just, it's wild!
